title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for May 17
itunes:title: Bloomberg Markets: Chart of the Day, Eco Brief for May 17
description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Carl Riccadonna Chief U.S. Economist Bloomberg Intelligence Discussing the economy and markets with Bloomberg Stocks Editor Dave Wilson, who also discusses his Chart of the Day "Don't assume calm in U.S. stocks will give way to storm."

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
